sections.heading: Definitions.Section 15-35 to 15-38
sections.text: - Commission and Department of Aeronautics. Director and deputy director of aeronautics. Oath. Police authority of commissioner and inspectors.Section 15-39. - Inspector's credentials.Section 15-40. - General powers and duties of commission.Section 15-41. - Regula

sections.heading: to 15-38. - Commission and Department of Aeronautics
sections.text: Director and deputy director of aeronautics. Oath. Police authority of commissioner and inspectors.

sections.heading: General powers and duties of commission.
sections.text: General powers and duties of commission.

sections.heading: to 15-42d. - State airways system
sections.text: Long-range planning. Declaration of policy. Research into future state aviation facility needs. Advisory committee. Receipt of federal and private funds. Consultative services.

sections.heading: to 15-51. - No exclusive rights to be granted
sections.text: Federal aid; contracts by commissioner as agent of the state or a municipality. Authority of commission over state airports. Regulation of motor vehicles on state airports. Agreements for fire protection. Regulation of aircraft, airmen, airports and air

sections.heading: Operation of aircraft during period of suspension or revocation of right to operate.
sections.text: Operation of aircraft during period of suspension or revocation of right to operate.

sections.heading: Licensing of airports and landing areas.
sections.text: Licensing of airports and landing areas.

sections.heading: Revocation or suspension of right to operate aircraft.
sections.text: Revocation or suspension of right to operate aircraft.

sections.heading: to 15-59. - Concealment of revocation
sections.text: Registration or license voided by fraud. Notice of change of address or change in aircraft. Operation unlawful without license or certificate. Exceptions to registration requirements.

sections.heading: to 15-65. - Approval of airports and other air navigation facilities
sections.text: Certificates of approval and licenses: Hearings, standards, revocation. Federal government facilities exempt.

sections.heading: Tampering or interfering with airports, heliports, vertiports, landing fields, airways, security devices or equipment
sections.text: Circumventing or failing to comply with security measures. Providing false information or withholding information on documents required by security plans or measures. Penalty.

sections.heading: and 15-71. - Coroner to investigate fatal accidents. Accidents to be reported.
sections.text: and 15-71. - Coroner to investigate fatal accidents. Accidents to be reported.

sections.heading: Operating aircraft or unmanned aircraft carelessly, negligently or recklessly.
sections.text: Operating aircraft or unmanned aircraft carelessly, negligently or recklessly.

sections.heading: Operation of unmanned aircraft over boundaries of private premises. Penalty.
sections.text: Operation of unmanned aircraft over boundaries of private premises. Penalty.

sections.heading: Airport protection privileges. Encroachments prohibited. Standards for determining necessity of taking land.
sections.text: Airport protection privileges. Encroachments prohibited. Standards for determining necessity of taking land.

sections.heading: Removal of obstructions to air navigation.
sections.text: Removal of obstructions to air navigation.

sections.heading: Permit for lines and facilities within one-half mile of runway.
sections.text: Permit for lines and facilities within one-half mile of runway.

sections.heading: Abandoned aircraft. Lien for storage charges. Notice to executive director.
sections.text: Abandoned aircraft. Lien for storage charges. Notice to executive director.

sections.heading: Operating under or carrying passengers under influence of liquor or drugs. Penalty.
sections.text: Operating under or carrying passengers under influence of liquor or drugs. Penalty.

sections.heading: and 15-79. - Receipts from convictions; deposit in General Fund. Municipal and state airports; establishment; state plan of development.
sections.text: and 15-79. - Receipts from convictions; deposit in General Fund. Municipal and state airports; establishment; state plan of development.

sections.heading: to 15-86. - Federal and other aid
sections.text: Commission may act as agent of municipality for acceptance of federal aid. Contracts by municipality. Municipalities may lease airports. Financial assistance to municipal airports. Technical services to municipalities.

sections.heading: Service of process against nonresident owners and operators.
sections.text: Service of process against nonresident owners and operators.

sections.heading: Appeal to Public Utilities Regulatory Authority.
sections.text: Appeal to Public Utilities Regulatory Authority.
